abstracts.cdata!:
The stipends program has been a testing
            ground for innovations, where approaches and instruments
            pioneered under FSSAP have tended to find their way into
            other Government- and donor-funded projects, including
            primary school initiatives, in Bangladesh and elsewhere. The
            project does not attempt to tackle wholesale reform, rather
            it is a piece within the larger efforts championed by the
            Government of Bangladesh in partnership with other donors,
            including the Asian Development Bank (ADB), the Norwegian
            Agency for Development Cooperation (NORAD), and the European
            Union (EU).
